newt_entry_set

(PECL newt >= 0.1)

newt_entry_set —

Description

void newt_entry_set ( resource $entry , string $value [, bool $cursor_at_end ] )
Warning

This function is currently not documented; only its argument list is available.

Parameters

entry

value

cursor_at_end

Return Values

No value is returned.
